title: [Get Started with NTT](/docs/products/native-token-transfers/get-started/)
content: Start your journey with Wormhole's NTT by learning to install its CLI, deploy test tokens, and set up it's initial structure for seamless token movement.

title: Deploy NTT
content:
If seeking guidance deploying native token transfers across blockchains like EVM-compatible chains and Solana here are some resources.  
**→** [Deploy to EVM](/docs/products/native-token-transfers/guides/deploy-to-evm/)  

**→** [Deploy to EVM Chains via Launchpad](/docs/products/native-token-transfers/guides/evm-launchpad/)   
**→** [Deploy to Solana](/docs/products/native-token-transfers/guides/deploy-to-solana/)

title: Customize NTT
content:
These links provide documentation on configuring crucial operational and security settings for native token transfers, covering access control and rate limits.   
**→** [Access control](/docs/products/native-token-transfers/configuration/access-control/)  
**→** [Rate limits](/docs/products/native-token-transfers/configuration/rate-limiting/)
